# AlarmPresentationState.Mode.countdown(_:)

**Case**

A mode indicating the alarm timer is active.

## Declaration

```swift
case countdown(AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Countdown)
```

## Discussion

An alarm can only be in one of these states at a time.

## Creating a countdown

- **AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Countdown**: An object that specifies a countdown is in progress.
